meanings: That is so for a reason
Look at that(, please)[Look at that/Please, look at at/Can you look at that?]

vlive.korean: 그것은 타고나야 됩니다! You have to be born handsome! 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: You have to be born handsome!

vlive.korean: [그것보다] 방금 OK를 하셨는데? [But] You just said okay. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
그것도 되는 거야? - 그럼~ - 자 '이'! That works too? - Of course. - "Y!" 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
그것도 정말 좋은 생각인 것 같아요 - 그렇죠? That's a good idea. - Right? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
"나는 그것을 원한다" 이 책을 원한다는 거겠지? "I want that". He or she wants this photo book, probably? 듣기 View video Dispatch : 트와이스 ‘디아이콘’ 언박싱🐰🐹🦅
vlive.english: "I want that". He or she wants this photo book, probably?
